description: Try our easy to follow Prawn, Chickpea & Parsley Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn, Chickpea & Parsley Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs flat leaf parsley, finely chopped (plus parsley leaves, to serve)
rice bran oil (or vegetable oil, for shallow frying)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour, bicarbonate of soda, smoked paprika and 1 tsp salt in a bowl. Whisk to combine. Make a well in the centre, add soda water and whisk until smooth.
Combine onion, parsley, prawns and chickpeas in a bowl. Season with pepper. Add to batter and stir well.

In a clean bowl, whisk egg whites until soft peaks form. Gently fold into batter. Heat 1cm of oil in a deep frying pan and using 2 tbs of mixture for each, cook fritters for 23 minutes each side or until golden. Drain on paper towel.
Serve fritters with aioli and lemon wedges and garnish with parsley.
